Package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.ui.controllers

package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.ui.controllers
Contains controller classes that manage user interactions, bridging the user interface with application services to process and respond to user input.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.ui
    This package is responsible for all user interface components.
    cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.ui.tui
    Provides classes for the Text User Interface (TUI) of the financial accounting system.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddRecordController
    Controller responsible for handling the addition of records and categories to the system.
    ControllerCore
    Core controller class that orchestrates operations across different controllers and manages service container.
    LoginController
    Controller responsible for handling user login processes.
    MainMenuController
    Controller responsible for managing the main menu of the application.
    SettingsController
    Controller for handling settings functionality within the application.
    ShowRecordsController
    Controller for handling record display and manipulation.
    ShowStatisticsController
    Controller for handling the display and calculation of statistical data.
